job.title: Associate Software Engineer

ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll doltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthe associate backend developer on the engineering team is responsible for the implementation design architecture and quality control of business integrationsgeneral development within the customerfacing product application and internal tools used by development technical operations this includes troubleshooting bugs and implementing new features as required in existing backend applications even building new components as needed a successful associate backend developer will produce all required functionality in a timely manner and will communicate and work with colleagues to solve problems and improve the systems they work withltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtheres a closer look at this key roleltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtprioritize and plan for deliverables in an iterative development strategyltligtltligtdocument code and test technical solutions and enhancements for existing systems bringing a new perspective and a willingness to improveltligtltligtfollow agile software development methodologies for implementation ltligtltligtwork with various teams in logicmonitor to deliver software products that support logicmonitors business growthltligtltligtconstantly work towards career growth and learning opportunities there will be a lot of technologies to absorb and we want someone who is motivated and able to learn quickly ltligtltligttroubleshoot and resolve productapplication issues for escalated support cases ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll java development framework and opensource tools ltligtltligtstrong understanding of web application architecturesltligtltligtable to quickly develop competencies in numerous technologies learn
